title: noormcs5
author: noormcs5
content: Hi, I am looking for bitcoin and crypto currencies popular groups which provide good services in terms of knowledge and signals too.I understand that we should not follow the signals from groups and try to create our own signals with our knowledge but sometimes the signals from the groups can give confluence that our own signals match the ones being shared in public groups.So if anyone has a list of discord Servers, do mention them here.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: bumpAnyone willing to help and tell about some good crypto discord groups ?Or there aren't any and that's why no one replied

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: If you like Bitcoin collectibles this one have a bit chat https://discord.gg/kuEXc9AQyKSame guys as here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: JanEmil on March 05, 2023, 02:00:54 PMIf you like Bitcoin collectibles this one have a bit chat https://discord.gg/kuEXc9AQyKSame guys as here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0This is bitcoin collectibles group and i don't see any signals related stuff in here ?  This is not related to bitcoin signals. Right?Anyways thanks for sharing this too, its worth looking at

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on March 05, 2023, 10:05:49 AMbumpAnyone willing to help and tell about some good crypto discord groups ?Or there aren't any and that's why no one replied  Maybe because you posted in the wrong board?Try Trading Discussion. You might get a couple of suggestions.I don't know any good signal group in my telegram or discord because I never believe in them and probably most people around don't either. But Good luck in your quest.
